#summary Some examples of reglib usage

=Examples=

{{{
<script type="text/javascript" src="/path/to/reg.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">

reg.importAll();

// popup links
reg.click('a@href.popup', function(e){
    var target = (this.target) ? this.target : "_blank";
    var width = 600;
    var height = 400;
    var dim = mcn(this, /(\d+)x(\d+)/);
    if (dim) {
        width = parseInt(dim[1]);
        height = parseInt(dim[2]);
    }
    if (width > screen.width) { width = screen.width - 50; }
    if (height > screen.height) { height = screen.height - 50; }
    var pop = window.open(this.href, target, "scrollbars,status,resizable,width="+width+",height="+height);
});

</script>
}}}
